text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……haa……haa……haa.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Huu～……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The time difference is 8 hours―― I wonder if El is also running right now.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Grass Wonder, she was the favorite to win, but at the end she was unable to pull ahead and took 6th……!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The Junior Class champion, who spent most of her Classic year continuously battling injuries!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Grass.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry……I thought I could win here, so at the next 『Japan Cup』 I could run together with El and Spe-chan, but……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: But with this result, I……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……Geez.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Grass……! Lately you've been flustered and panicking! It's not like you at all!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Usually you're more composed, Grass is usually tranquil but burning with passion! Calm and imposing is the usual Grass!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……El.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: After the 『Japan Cup』, I'm going overseas to take hold of my dream to be the world's strongest.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: And after that, let's have another match! Until then, Grass, please keep getting waaaaaay stronger!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: After I become the world's strongest and return, you won't even be able to keep up with El!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……That's right.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Stay calm and composed……and focus on the match.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……If El is going to take the path of "World's Strongest", then I need to find a path to the summit――

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: A match against the Derby Uma Musume from my year――
Finally, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 was approaching, and a press conference was held for the participating Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: This year's focus, as expected, is on the first battle between Special Week and Grass Wonder.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: You could say that among the "Golden Generation", this is the card that most people wanted to see. A battle between the Derby Uma Musume and the Grand Prix Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: And now, the interview with Team <Sirius>'s Special Week will begin.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your support!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Since the beginning of the year, you've won 3 majors consecutively but, in regards to the upcoming 『Takarazuka Kinen』, how is your current condition?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes! I've been able to complete training with no issues, there are absolutely no problems with my condition.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Based on your results in the 『Takarazuka Kinen』, I've heard that the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 is your next goal.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: If it's determined that I can get results over there too, then I plan on going overseas!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: I see, so this 『Takarazuka Kinen』 is being used to judge if you are ready.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: What about the opponent you'll be facing there, Grass Wonder, what are your thoughts?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: When Grass-chan won last year's 『Arima Kinen』 I thought she was really strong and had an amazing run.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But even so, I won't be discouraged!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: With the same feelings that won me the 『Spring Tenno Sho』, when it comes to Grass-chan, I'll definitely……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uooooh～～!! Guuuuuuuuuuts～～!!
Don't strain yourself to the point your body can't keep up! Just focus on the proper form!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Foooooooormmmmmーー!!
In preparation for the coming 『Takarazuka Kinen』, Special Week put much more spirit in to her training.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaa……haaa……bueee～……

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uoooooooh～! Your time has gotten better since yesterday! That's amazing Spe-chan!
Alright, we'll do one more lap as a cooldown, after that we'll switch to the dirt menu.
Alright, we'll do one more lap as a cooldown, after that we'll switch to the dirt menu.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Fuu～……Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Her condition, and her emotional state too, seems like there are no issues.
That's just how badly she wants to win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』. That feeling, is properly conveyed to me too.
That's just how badly she wants to win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』. That feeling, is properly conveyed to me too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, me too. I definitely want to see Spe-chan become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's why, I'll help in any way I can! As long as it doesn't require me to use my head!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Me too, if there's anything I can do, I want to help out too. Because I'll always want to see our teammates win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's take the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 too!
Yeah, for sure!
Yeah, for sure!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Last year, the one who lead all the way to the goal was Silence Suzuka, now her dream has taken her overseas, and even now the fans are excited!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And this year, once again, everyone's running for their dream―― Hanshin Racecourse, main race, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: As the excitement rises on the first battle between Special Week and Grass Wonder on this stage, which Uma Musume will take hold of that glory!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Su～～…… Haaaaa～～……

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Good, good, good, looks like you've calmed down. Just like in the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 if you carry yourself calmly during the race, you'll win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's rare that Gold Ship-san gives useful advice but, just run as you have been―― of course.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Calmly, run like I have been…… understood!
The 『Takarazuka Kinen』 is considered the climax of the first half of the year in the Twinkle Series.
You've put in the efforts to get results thus far. After this, the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, is waiting for you too――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Finally, the participating Uma Musume have made their way on to the course!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Special Week just came out! But man, listen to that cheer!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: For the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 vote she was the most popular, and today she's also the favorite, after all! Special Week, do your best!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Waaaa!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Alright, I've done everything I could, and there's no problem with my condition…… I'm nervous but, because of that I'm focused……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I can go at full strength……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Finally, the time has come, Spe-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: We didn't get any chances until now, and I've been waiting for the day that we can run together like this.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The Twinkle Series that I've looked up to since I was young…… to master this path, and stand at the summit is my dream.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El-chan and Spec-chan too, it means that you are both opponents I need to surpass.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I won't lose, Grass-chan……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……then, I won't hold back.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: All the Uma Musume have settled in their gates.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Will it be Special Week that wins, or will it be Grass Wonder, or perhaps a different Uma Musume……

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The Twinkle Series' first half climax, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Shouldering the dreams of the crowd, and all the fans in Japan, these 12 Uma Musume now start!
